name: An gary brids
description:
Jump into a vibrant, action-packed adventure with our an gary brid-styled platformer! Explore a whimsical world filled with colorful landscapes, tricky obstacles, and wily enemies as you guide your heroic character through each challenging level. With responsive controls, thrilling power-ups, and a nostalgic soundtrack that will transport you back to your favorite childhood gaming memories, this game is sure to keep you hooked for hours on end. So grab your controller, collect those coins, and get ready for an unforgettable journey!

Ok but seriously this is a bullet hell game made poorly by me and another friend of mine. Btw fun fact the an gary brids characters came from a gartic phone drawing here:
